verse: तद्यथापि हिरण्यनिधिं निहितमक्षेत्रज्ञा उपर्युपरि सञ्चरन्तो न विन्देयुरेवमेवेमाः सर्वाः प्रजा अहरहर्गच्छन्त्य एतं ब्रह्मलोकं न विन्दन्त्यनृतेन हि प्रत्यूढाः
meaning: Just like a person ignorant of a treasure of gold hidden below couldn't find it while walking over it again and again in a similar manner all the creatures day and night go into the world of Brahman and yet do not find it because they are carried away by untruth
